featured.text: In addition to traditional course materials such as videos, readings, and problem sets, MOOCs provide interactive user forums that help build a community for the students, professors, and teaching assistants.
The user has to spend additional money for it.

definition.zh_def: 用來指稱某個人或某些人的名詞，通常是指社會或組織中的成員。
definition.en_def: A term used to refer to an individual or individuals, typically a member of a society or organization.
definition.example: Every user must agree to the terms and conditions before accessing the service.
